n, m = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
back = [false] * n
m.times do
  s, t = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  (s...t).each{ |i| back[i] = true }
end
puts n + 1 + back.count(true) * 2

n, m = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
cd = m.times.map{gets.split.map(&:to_i)}
b = Array.new(n+1, false)
cd.each do |cc|
    cc[0].upto(cc[1]-1) do |i|
        b[i] = true
    end
end
p b.count{|bl| bl} * 2 + n + 1

### main

n, m = gets.split.map(&:to_i)

sum = n + 1

if m > 0
  rngs = Array.new(m){gets.split.map(&:to_i)}.sort
  #p rngs

  l0, r0 = rngs[0]
  for i in (1...m)
    l1, r1 = rngs[i]
    if r0 < l1
      sum += (r0 - l0) * 2
      l0 = l1
      r0 = r1
    else
      r0 = r1 if r0 < r1
    end
  end
  sum += (r0 - l0) * 2
end

puts sum

n, r = gets.split.map &:to_i
res = (1..r).map{ gets.split.map(&:to_i) }.sort_by(&:last) + [[n+1, n+1]]
hash ={nil => 0}
until res.empty?
	poster, prior = res.shift
	new_hash = Hash.new(Float::INFINITY)
	
	hash.each{|min, cost|
		min = poster if !min || poster < min 
		new_hash[min] = cost if cost < new_hash[min]
		c = cost + (prior - min) * 2
		new_hash[nil] = c if c < new_hash[nil]
	}
	hash = new_hash
end
p hash[nil] + n + 1

N, m = map(int, input().split())
v = [0]*N
for i in range(m):
    c, d = map(int, input().split())
    v[c-1] += 1
    v[d-1] -= 1
s = 0; fst = 0
ans = N+1
for i in range(N):
    if s == 0 and v[i] > 0:
        fst = i
    s += v[i]
    if s == 0 and v[i] < 0:
        ans += (i - fst)*2
print(ans)

N,m = map(int, input().split())
again = set()
for i in range(m):
    a,b = map(int, input().split())
    for k in range(a,b):
        again.add(k)
        
r = N+1 + 2*(len(again))
print(r)

import sys
reader=(token for line in sys.stdin for token in line.split())

while 1:
  try:
    n=int(next(reader))
    m=int(next(reader))
  except: break

  a=[1]*(n+1)
  for i in range(m):
    c=int(next(reader))-1
    d=int(next(reader))-1
    for i in range(c,d):
      a[i]=3
  print(sum(a))
